content:
the three students won the  Minnesota Cup for the creation of a coupon and map booklet PERIOD

by  Sam DarcyPublished  September  

For most current students paying tuition is as much as they ever give back to the University PERIOD But a group of seniors created a new scholarship for firstyear students PERIOD

Entrepreneurial seniors Travis Boisvert and Ryan Broshar along with  graduate Joe Collins donated  to endow a new scholarship for firstyear students pursuing an entrepreneurial major PERIOD The Universitys Office of the President matched the donation PERIOD

The donation would provide one student with a scholarship of about  each year but it could double or triple over time Collins said PERIOD

The money came from the profits of a business the students started last spring in an entrepreneurship in action class at the Carlson School of Management PERIOD

The students created the U Guide a booklet of coupons and maps designed to connect new students to local businesses PERIOD

The U Guide garnered a  profit PERIOD The students donated  to Housing and Residential Life before donating the rest for the scholarship PERIOD

The students said they thought they owed it to the University for giving them so many opportunities PERIOD They said they are excited about leaving a legacy PERIOD

The biggest draw to starting a scholarship is the longevity Boisvert said PERIOD A group of seniors donating to their alma mater before graduating is a cool legacy to leave. martha Douglas University Foundation communications director said she thinks its unprecedented for enrolled students to start a scholarship since the creation of the Presidents Scholarship Match in  PERIOD

Douglas said the University will keep the  and use the collected interest for the scholarship every year PERIOD

John Stavig the Carlson Schools entrepreneurial studies director said hes glad to see the students develop a profitable business and then decide to give back PERIOD

Its extremely unique in terms of what they achieved in their first months of operation Stavig said PERIOD Theyve created a legacy with the profits from their business. entrepreneurial senior Mike Copa said the scholarship will benefit future entreprenuerial students because the benfactors have set a mark to strive for PERIOD

I was impressed by the quality of work but more impressed that they donated back to start a scholarship Copa said PERIOD

The students plan to release a spring version of the U Guide and hope to expand to the University of WisconsinEau Claire and St PERIOD Cloud State by next fall PERIOD

They said they hope to start similar scholarships at other schools but will always remember the University as their springboard for the future Boisvert said PERIOD

The the most important part of the scholarship the students said is the opportunity to help people PERIOD

I hope it gives people motivation and courage to try something on their own Broshar said PERIOD
